segments.text: What is your understanding of a job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It provides breads and butter of your family . Besides , it simulates you to purse noble dreams ,
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why do you want to work for us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your company is well-known for its good corporate profile and rapid growing records . I want to work for a company that can display my abilities and talents .
segments.speaker: S2
